VISA INFORMATION

This page contains general information about invite letter to obtain visa to attend the conference in India. Please note delegates are advised to consult with the Indian embassy and consulate services in their home country regarding visa requirements:


The letter of invitation and documents can be generated after you complete your registration
Details required:
  • Full Name as in passport
  • Passport Number
  • Passport Validity – From & To Date
  • Address to whom the letter needs to be addressed
Details to be provided to the Organizing chairs – Samuel Dorairaj samuel.v.dorairaj@intel.com & Lata Prabhu lprabhu@qti.qualcomm.com
Visa Letters will be provided within 2 working days of receipt of requests
With the Visa letters, delegates need to make an appointment with the Indian embassy and consulate services in their home country to obtain an Indian visa
Last date for requesting visa letters– Dec 6’2019
